Official log4j documentation

With the exception of the complete manual, the following documentation is included with the standard log4j distribution and also browsable online:

  • short manual,

  • complete manual (commercial),

  • javadoc documentation,

  • LogFactor5 documentation,

  • project history,

  • FAQ,

  • troubleshooting guide.


Articles on log4j

  • Don't Use System.out.println! Use Log4j by Vipan Singla

  • Build Flexible Logs With log4j by Vikram Goyal

  • log4j by Ashley J.S Mills, University Of Birmingham

  • Add logging to your Java Applications by Kevin Brown

  • How does the Java logging API stack up against log4j? by Kevin Brown

  • OpenSymphony Logging Primer

  • log4j FAQ at jGuru

  • Think Again by Ceki Gülcü

  • Supporting the log4j RepositorySelector by Ceki Gülcü

  • Log4j class diagrams, courtesy of David Tonhofer

  • Advanced Log4j Louisville JUG presentation by Jonathan Cowherd

If you would like your log4j-relateed article to be listed here, then please send a note to the log4j-user@jakarta.apache.org list.
